hi mate,  yeah good thanks.  Any idea how long before something will change with pirate bay yet?  I noticed a couple of weeks ago that weird message that appears sometimes saying something about navigate away from this page click OK etc.. What's all that about? lol

With this torrent, but not the audio rip the DVD one I have recorded the video into my PC using a Compro Videomate T750 TV card which I got a while ago.  I do like the quality but I want to get it better if I can :-D  Any idea of anybody you might know with a good TV card that can record in ultra high quality these days?  I'm just wondering really, might do some more of these video things in the future but I wanna improve things to make the picture quality look awesome
